scenario_text.value:
Just come already!
You’ll figure it out when you get here!

(Those two are super excited.
Could it be...?!)
Take a look. Dracmon found these...

Footprints...!
There are two completely different sets!

One set clearly belongs to Labramon!
So these must be...!

Aoi and Labramon’s footprints!
Thank goodness, they came around the school.

But wait, ain’t it weird? They’re facing the
wrong way.

You’re right... They’re heading away from the
school, not towards it...

Maybe the sun went down and she lost her way
or something.

Not a chance! She wouldn’t get lost if
Labramon’s with her.

Well why, then?
Maybe she went looking for something?

(Aoi wouldn’t normally do something like
that. She must be in shock...)

Well whatever the reason, we can’t just leave
her alone. Let’s all go after her!
